extension.name: ChatBro
extension.author: ChatBro Team
extension.description:
Live chat for your community with social networks integration. Chat conversation is being syncronized with popular messengers. Allows your visitors to chat online in live group chat with you and each other. Skyrocket user engagement and overall time spent on your website.
mod_chatbro.xml mod_chatbro.php index.html helper.php tmpl/default.php tmpl/index.html
